name: Newcomen Atmospheric Engine
description:
Please enter proper fullscreen if you are playing the web version, the text gets angry otherwise.

Made in a slightly too busy 48 hour period for Ludum Dare 49.

You are the manager of a brand new Atmospheric Engine, the first steam engine ever made! Use it to pump water out of the unstable mine below you to prevent its collapse

The Atmospheric engine is not a simple thing, it must be treated correctly. Place coal in the boiler to create steam that you then let into the cylinder. When the cylinder is orange it is full of steam and is ready to be cooled down (using the coolant water that you will have to periodically refill), creating a vacuum that will pull the piston down. Repeat this until you or the poor miners below you's death please. 

The atmospheric engine should be at least semi-correct so you have learnt something by playing this game as well. :)

Controls:

All mouse, click stuff to pick it up or to toggle it. You can press M to mute the music though.
